name: coeq2i
params: class c0, class c1, class c2

stmt.origin: ax-mp(wceq(ccom(c0, c1), ccom(c0, c2)), wceq(c1, c2))

body.origin:
|- wceq(ccom(c0, c1), ccom(c0, c2))
-| wceq(c1, c2)
-| wi(wceq(c1, c2), wceq(ccom(c0, c1), ccom(c0, c2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(ccom(c0, c1), ccom(c0, c2))
-| wceq(c1, c2)
-| wi(wceq(c1, c2), wceq(ccom(c0, c1), ccom(c0, c2)))

body.origin: |- wi(wceq(c1, c2), wceq(ccom(c0, c1), ccom(c0, c2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(ccom(c0, c1), ccom(c0, c2))
-| wceq(c1, c2)

comment: Equality inference for composition of two classes. (Contributed by NM, 16-Nov-2000.)
